item.title: Docker启动Jenkins报错
item.description: iptables failed: iptables –wait -t nat -A DOCKER -p tcp -d 0/0 –dport 10241 -j DNAT –to-destination 172.17.0.5:50000 ! -i docker0: iptables: No chain/target/match by that name. docker启动Jenkins报错： iptables failed: iptables --wait -t nat -A DOCKER -p tcp -d 0/0 --dport 10241 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.17.0.5:50000 ! -i docker0: iptables: No chain/target/match by that name. 解决办法：重启docker systemctl restart docker
